values: Charming Center Square townhome w/garden apartment! The 2 BR/1.5BA two story owners unit features a beautiful open floor plan w/gleaming hardwood floors, exposed brick & beams. Cozy up to the gas stove in living / family room. Walk through French doors to a bright sun porch w/skylights & a private Sauna/shower room! Charm continues upstairs w/stained glass pocket doors & a wood stove! This home is complete w/a fenced-in yard & deck! Full 1BR/1BA garden level apartment great income to cover many expenses.
Built-In Cabinets, High Speed Internet, Cable Television
Vaulted Ceiling, Ceramic Tile, Sliding Glass Door, Skylight, Fireplace Insert, Sauna, Wood Floors, High Speed Internet
Range w/Oven, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, Washer & Dryer
